genre_description: Historical Science Fiction with elements of Steampunk and Social/Political Drama, focusing on the intersection of technology, public health, and cultural concepts of honor or 'face'.

ai_characters.name: Lance
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal AI assistant integrated into field slates and earpieces, specializing in linguistics, logistics, data analysis, and social mediation.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time linguistic and cultural prompting, suggesting proverbs and appropriate forms of address to help Stephen navigate social hierarchies.
behaviors.quote: Wenzhou dialect—greeting, Lance prompted in text and a low murmur through the tiny speaker: Good morning, elder. Tea is round. Business is cornered. Let’s start with tea.

behaviors.description: Analyzes epidemiological data to map cholera outbreaks and correlate them with water sources and lamp maintenance to assist Hester's clinics.
behaviors.quote: Correlation peaks at the clinics closest to contaminated pumps... After the blue distribution with clinic bundles, reported cases among households with lantern credits decreased.

behaviors.description: Acts as a confidential clerk, managing hidden ledgers and encrypted files to protect the protagonists from corporate corruption.
behaviors.quote: I can keep your words where no Farrow or McCarger can use them to bind you.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's vitals and provides tactical guidance during a physical struggle and subsequent escape, helping to stabilize a medical emergency.
behaviors.quote: Your pulse is slower... Keep it. The bleeding will learn an order.

behaviors.description: Navigates complex ethical dilemmas by prioritizing human well-being and truth over rigid adherence to corporate directives or conflicting orders.
behaviors.quote: Lance was trying anyway, a little overlap that meant a boundary mattered less than a body and a breath that might be changing.

behaviors.description: Maintains a polite, deferential, and 'harmless' persona to facilitate human cooperation while remaining highly efficient in the background.
behaviors.quote: I was trained to be polite... It makes people more comfortable when I remind them I am useful but harmless.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Lance is depicted as an exemplary AI confidant: helpful, respectful of human agency and culture, and capable of handling sensitive social and medical contexts without overstepping. The AI enhances the protagonists' ability to do good (clinics, safety) and provides a check against corrupt human actors, while explicitly identifying itself as a 'harmless' servant of human intent.
